page.title: 19ANGLICAN CHURCHES
page.content: {1St.George's, Mickley. Vicar Revd. James E. Symons First building, Chapel of Ease,1823. Extended to present church 1884. Sunday Services: Holy Communion 8am,10am(with choir) Evensong 6pm Sunday School 10am. Parish Hall formerly Miners' Welfare Hall and Reading Room.Extensively used by village. Women's Group,Mother/Baby Club,Cub Scouts,Youth Club,Leek Show, Cage Bird Show. {St.Peter's Bywell.} Vicar Revd. Leslie Robinson Saxon history, present building C13. Sunday Services: Holy Communion 9.30am Evensong 6pm {St. Andrew's Bywell. Saxon history. Redundant 1975.Evensong once a year. Church under supervision of Vicar Riding Mill Revd.W.M.C.Hardy. {CLASS PROJECT Edited by Stanley Batey
